companies.name: Gojek
companies.description: Founded on the principle of solving everyday challenges with technology, the Gojek app has evolved from offering just ride-hailing to a suite of more than 20 services today. As we continue to grow as a leading tech company serving everyday solutions for millions of users across Southeast Asia, our passion for problem-solving grows

companies.name: Tokopedia
companies.description: Indonesia is the largest archipelago in the world: 17K islands made it difficult to develop an even infrastructure. Merchants move to big cities for better market, while consumers have limited access to goods. This led to unnecessary urbanization-goods are clustered in bigger cities

companies.name: Traveloka
companies.description: Traveloka is a leading Southeast Asia online travel company that provides a wide range of travel needs in one platform, enabling customers to create moments together with their loved ones. Traveloka offers flights, hotels, trains, flight + hotel packages, attractions & activities, connectivity products*, airport transports, buses*, and car rental
